name: Gravit0ss WARPED
description:
Xbox Controller required.

Keyboard and mouse NOT supported.

A 3D space platformer where you control the power of temperature to guide your way through the stage.
The higher you climb, the colder you get.
If you descend at a rapid pace, you quickly increase in temperature.
Use Hot and Cold Shockwaves to absorb enemy missiles and blast enemies and barriers in your way.
Use boost pads to quickly reach the next platform.
Reach the top floor, and you win.

Major Project of my final year of university.
